title: ST-51E Multiple Channel Radio
explain: The multiple channel radio make application as two independent dual channel radio and relay radio。It  enhance communication range to realize BLOS communication when work as a relay radio。The typical application scenarios is shown as follows：
features:
Functions

  • function of a voice and data transmission relay;
